titleStmt.title: A letter from Paris, from Sir George Wakeman, to his friend Sir W.S. in London.
titleStmt.author: Scroggs, William, Sir, 1623?-1683.
Wakeman, George, Sir, fl. 1668-1685, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Sir George Wakeman.
A political satire attacking Sir W.S., i.e. Sir William Scroggs.
Identified as Wing W276 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 969.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
